pr_title: Javadoc to describe the block/fluid state properties Minecraft provides

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT  A property that specifies if a block is waterlogged.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT A property that specifies if a block is waterlogged.
timeline.author: liach
YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,94 +1,204 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_2741 net/minecraft/state/property/Properties + COMMENT Contains all block and fluid state properties that Minecraft uses. FIELD field_12480 FALLING Lnet/minecraft/class_2746; + COMMENT A property that specifies if a fluid is falling. FIELD field_12481 HORIZONTAL_FACING Lnet/minecraft/class_2753; + COMMENT A property that specifies the direction a block is facing. + COMMENT + COMMENT

This property only allows a block to face in one of the cardinal directions (north, south, east and west).

replies.bodyText: Nah, javadoc generator will auto add closing tags
replies.author: liach
